## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT3G15820](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT3G15820)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>ROD1</u>
- **Gene Name:** REDUCED OLEATE DESATURATION 1
- **Description:**   phosphatidic acid phosphatase-related / PAP2-like protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2093257
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*

## Transcripts:
   -  [AT3G15820.1](https://www.arabidopsis.org/gene?name=AT3G15820.1)
## Gene Ontology:
   - [GO:0004142](https://amigo.geneontology.org/amigo/term/GO:0004142)&nbsp;---&nbsp;enables&nbsp;---&nbsp;diacylglycerol cholinephosphotransferase activity
   - [GO:0046470](https://amigo.geneontology.org/amigo/term/GO:0046470)&nbsp;---&nbsp;acts upstream of or within&nbsp;---&nbsp;phosphatidylcholine metabolic process
## Germplasm Phenotype:
   - [rod1]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;decrease in 18:2 and 18:3 polyunsaturated fatty acids and a concomitant  increase in 18:1 relative to wildtype
